A drop of foot sweat ran down the massive sole of the giantess and Catherine was forced to lick it up to remoisten her dry mouth. She licked again and again as she was forced to swallow foot sweat and bits of dirt that the giantess had trod on. She wasn't able to even lick that far up as she was rather small compared to the massive feet of the giantess

It took Catherine forever just to lick one heel. Kyria had just been lounging on the bench enjoying the sun. She moved to the other heel and began to lick at it. It tasted just as bad as the other. Catherine lapped away at the dirty sweaty heel of the giantess for some time. She was still not use to the sweaty earthy taste of the massive feet but it was getting a little more bearable.

Kyria suddenly sat up and spread her feet so she could look at Catharine.

"How silly of me. You probably can't even lick past the bottom of my heels since you're an insect." Kyria giggled. "This should be better for you."

Kyria suddenly turned over to lay on the bench so her feet were sole side up as she lay on the bench. The huge toes were right in front of Catherine and she shuddered as she remembered being between them a bit ago.

"Keep licking slave. I want my feet spotless or else I'll give you a much part look of them." Kyria boomed as Catherine scrambled to the massive toes and struggled to climb on top of them to lick. Kyria reached back and undid the strap of her bra so it do not leave an awkward tan line on bronzed body as she sunned herself.

For Catherine this was much worse. Before with Kyria's feet towering over her she had been afforded some shade, but now she was slaving away on the hot sun with it beating down on her and warming the already got sweaty soles of the goddess. Catherine licked at each toe as best she could before moving on. There was no way she could actually clean this giantess's feet by herself. The feet were absolutely massive as she gazed up the mighty sole which now was slightly wrinkled from the giantess laying. She would just like as best she could. It took her forever to finish the bottoms of the sweaty toes of the giantess. Thankfully she didn't seem to want the space between her toes cleaned. Kyria could barely even feel the tiny licking her foot but knew she was down there doing it. Kyria also thought of what to do with the tiny. Catherine licked and licked at the sweaty soles. The beating sun had warmed the flesh and tiny droplets of sweat had formed and were now present on the soles of the giantess. She just licked foot filth off the massive sole of a goddess. This goddess just wanted humiliate her Catherine thought. She was already soaked in her foot sweat, her hair matted and dress reeking of this giantess's sweaty odor.

The sun had moved well across the sky and Catherine felt hot and overworked. She had made little progress as the huge hot foot rested. Her dress was encumbering her but she didn't want to remove it. It was the last thing she had to hold on to her humanity. She glanced up the sole once again and groaned. So much of the foot was left. She began to feel light headed and her dress seemed to be even more constricting than usual. She felt incredibly hot and sweaty and light headed. She turned and suddenly could feel her self going weak as she passed out from a combination of being overworked and heat exhaustion.

Kyria noticed the tickling on her right foot had stopped. There was no way that tiny mortal was dumb enough to try to run away. Kyria turned her head and lifted it a bit toward her feet. She shifted her foot a tiny bit and felt something hit her toes. She wiggled the massive sweaty digits and could feel the tiny lump still there. She curled her massive toes around the lump, trapping it in a sweaty toe embrace. She scrunched her toes several times on Catherine's motionless body before tilting her feet so Catherine tumbled from the toes.

Kyria put her fur bra back before turning over and sitting up. She placed her feet on the ground and slid forward on the bench. She noticed the tiny laying on the bench unmoving. Kyria poked her with her massive finger.

Catherine remained motionless as Kyria plucked her up. It brought a smile to Kyria's face knowing the torment she had put this little mortal through. Kyria pondered what to do with the passed out girl.
1232121211.title: Makes Catherine lick her sweaty feet

1232122.content:
The sun warms the tanned skin of the athletic giantess and from her gathering sweat, miniature columns of steam rise into the air. For the trapped princess in between her toes, the sweat building there gives her a welcome means of escape. Slowly, she feels her body slide from the skin until she can move much of her body. But she is also quite high off the surface of the bench and as soon as her body loosens from her unaware grasp, she slides down the sole and onto the surface.

The fall itself didn't hurt her so much, but she has never been used to falling from so high before. Still, her dress reeks of sweaty feet and something sweet-smelling - foot lotion or fragrant oil perhaps. She finds herself between Kyria's legs. The muscular legs go up towards hips covered slightly by the fur loincloth, but it isn't enough coverage for her divine body. Remembering that Solas and Puella are searching for her, maybe she can find somewhere to hide on Kyria or in the garden. After all, she doesn't know she's there.

Suddenly, a loud yawn signals the goddess coming to life. As she blinks the sleepiness from her eyes, she splays her feet further off the bench as she straightens her flowing hair. The loincloth draws closer to the tiny princess as her feet touch the ground again. She stands up and stretches before she resumes her carefree exercise routine.
1232122.title: Benchwarmer

12321221.content:
The front flap of Kyria's fur loincloth glides towards the tiny princess as the giant goddess prepares to lift off the bench. Catherine panics, less so that what is happening at the moment; but she would be left so exposed for Solas and Puella to find her. As the details of the article of clothing get more and more distinct to her eyes, Catherine makes an attempt to reach towards a large clump of fur.

Kyria gets off the bench and stretches, fully unaware that as she stands she carries on her a minuscule passenger.

Catherine's upper body burns with fatigue as she now has to put all her energy to grab hold of the tangled fur. She turns downwards to see the trees and titan-sized foliage alongside Kyria's feet. She shudders, the fear of her vertigo now claims her. One hand loses its grip.

Now the goddess' thighs play their role as Kyria starts to do a brisk walk. The flap bounces between the legs and hitting her crotch. Shaken, Catherine attempts to regain her hold once more before hauling herself further up the cloth closer to Kyria's body. The movement is weaker her for the tiny body, but escalates as Kyria's walk along the gold-tiled paths in the giant garden turns to a jog. The tiny princess holds for dear life, gritting her teeth as her palms sweat from fatigue and the heat coming from the giantess' exercising body.

The jogging stops, much to Catherine's relief; but a shadow cast over her chills her spine. Someone else is here in the garden with Kyria. Like a squirrel hiding in the crown of a tree, she digs into the long pelt in the hopes the fur alone would conceal her. Motionless, she turns to look up at the new figure.

He is a man, more muscular that Solas with dark curly hair and a black-stubbled chin. Behind his tunic, Catherine can make out the dark contours of his muscles and flesh valleys. His arms are crossed and, fortunate for the princess, his eyes are directed to Kyria's face rather than the puny human hiding in desperation in her loincloth flap.

"Greetings, Kyria," his voice is like thunder. "Care to race me today? The winner gets half the loser's share of little slaves we gathered today..."

Catherine trembles as Kyria responds...
12321221.title: Hail to the Cling

Kyria gives her calves a good stretch before she jogs off further from the bench into the garden. For Catherine, she covers the top of her eyes, The sun is right above her. The heat from it, the bench, and the lingering warmth of the sleeping Kyria makes the little princess uncomfortable. Her dress sticks to her arms as she breaks a sweat herself. But the heat isn't her greatest concern. Puella and Solas are still looking for her. She has to find cover to wait out their game. She knows they will get bored and find more humans for their games, leaving her undiscovered so she can find a way back home.

A shadow looms over her. She looks up, afraid for the worst. Instead, she stands in the shadow of a new giant. He looks nothing like Solas, with darker hair and bronzed complexion. He wears gold necklaces and cuffs, studded with enormous jewels, and a sash around his waist covering his loins. He occasionally sips from a monstrous chalice, big enough to satisfy the thirst of her entire palace. He seems to take some long periods of time in between sips, lips puckering each time. Faintly she can hear what sounds like to her distant human screams. What's going on here? Is he drinking people from his god-sized goblet?

The giant turns his back to her and bends his knees. He's going to sit down. His ass forms a shadow above her, as she stands where the sash doesn't cover and she could see everything. The cheeks get closer and closer. Catherine tries to run away from the shadow...

SLAM!

Catherine barely dodged being smashed beneath the giant's glutes, but in the end she ends up in a far worse place. The ass cheeks have spread to the sides, forcing down like a cruel canopy his sphincter. She can not see much, but a slight burst of gas tells her that it's just above her. At the other end might be his front, probably his balls resting on the bottom part of the sash and the bench.

Rex leans back, forcing the ravine of his ass to flatten out above Catherine. The portal to his anus is just above her...

The shadow lifts and a huge hand engulfs the tiny Catherine. Catherine screams as the giant sits and lifts her to his face. She hears the screams of people a little louder now as she is brought to the face of the giant.

"And what do we have here? A tiny insect in the garden? I almost crushed you bug." The gian boomed.

Catherine squirmed in response only for the fist to tighten.

"You're a pretty little thing. I think I'm going to have some fun with you."

Catherine heard Rex say...

At those words, Catherine became incredibly terrified all over again. Rex dropped Catherine into Solas's out stretched open hand.

"Thank you Rex. As you for you, you're in big trouble." Puella boomed as she looked at Catherine.

Solas's huge hand closed around Catherine trapping her in darkness. She could hear muffled voices and was shaken as Solas walked. Solas huge fist opened and Catherine was staring up into the face angry faces of Puella and Solas.

"We told you to try not to escape and what do you? Try to escape!" Solas thundered.

"Stupid mortals. They never listen." Puella sneered.

"I can explain! I was trying-"

"Save it bug! I don't care!" Solas boomed cutting off Catherine. He then bent over and dropped her on the ground before them. Catherine stared up at the two huge gods. The beautiful Puella with her perfect tan skin and Solas with his muscular, toned physique. Catherine's attention was drawn back to the floor by a booming tap of Puella's massive tan foot.

"Time to crush her. Get on with it Solas." Puella said while examining her fingernails.

"We warned you what would happen if you tried to escape. Now it's time to pay!" Solas said as he raised his smooth foot over Catherine.

"Any last words bug?" Solas said as Puella stood next to him with her hands on her hips and grinned.

Catherine stared up at the huge foot. This couldn't be how it ended? Her, a princess, crushed like a big beneath a god's foot? Catherine had to think quickly. She came up with an idea.

Catherine prostrated herself on the ground and began to grovel. "Please spare me mighty god and goddess! I am a bug yet I humbly throw myself at your feet to beg for your mercy and forgiveness!"

"How cute. I love when they grovel." Puella said giggling.

"You think begging will help you?" Solas said with his foot held over her still. "We can crush you and get another mortal to play with. You're nothing special."

"But I am something special! I am a princess! There are many of us humans but not many of us are princesses! Surely having me, someone who is held in high regard by mere mortals, groveling at your mighty feet is something that does not happen very often!"

"Hang on Solas. The bug does have a point. We have a mortal royal at our feet. Surely we can think of something better than crushing her like a common bug even if she did disobey us." Puella said gazing at Catherine harshly with the last few words.

Solas place his foot back down with a mighty crash.

"She is nothing special but does have a point. Princesses aren't exactly common and it would be a waste to simply crush her without having proper fun. I'm sure we can think of a punishment fitting of disobeying us." He said as a grin grew on his face.

Catherine remained prostrate but smiled grimly. Her plan had worked. She had saved herself but was now at the mercy of Puella and Solas all over again. She looked up slightly to see their huge feet. Puella's feet had perfect skin and were a rich tan color. Solas's godly feet were smooth looking. Her gaze lingered on his massive feet, thinking of she just barely avoided a very grisly end beneath them.

"What shall we do with her then?" Solas said snapping Catherine out of her trace.

"Oh I have a few ideas." Puella said happily.

She also had a cup filled with wine which she had dropped numerous townspeople in. She had walked into the dinning room and went to take her seat to begin her meal, smirking as she heard the tinies screaming and begging.

Catherine follows the long bronzed legs up which are quite toned to a fur animal print loincloth and sees that the giantess is wearing a matching bra. "Your screaming and begging is rather amusing, but I shall still eat you all!"

Catherine hears tiny screams before the giantess's booming laughter drowns them out. She is eating people Catherine thinks in horror. Suddenly the giantess stretches her long toned legs out and crosses her legs at the ankles so her left leg is crossed over her right. Catherine is given a view of the giantess's massive slightly dirty soles as she draws near. She glances up at the huge toes of the giantess which she sees wiggle and scrunch as the massive giantess reclines. Catherine continues running as now she had to alter her path to avoid the huge feet.

Catherine did want to get any closer to the absolutely massive feet. But Catherine was a bit curious of the huge feet and wanted a closer look. She decided she would just go a little bit closer, what's the worst that could happen? Catherine unfortunately had ventured too close to the huge feet of the giantess. She watched as the giantess uncrosses her legs and her heels hit the ground making a loud booming noise. Suddenly, the huge feet of the giantess come down from the heels to rest flat and the right foot of the giantess came down upon Catherine who screamed. The giantess then dragged her massive feet back to the sitting position she had been in before as she had finished her meal of meat, fruit and tiny people. Before Kyria went to stand up though, she felt something under the toes of her right foot.

Catherine screamed as she was dragged across the cold floor by the giant toes. The foot had come to a stop but then the massive toes curled and trapped her in their embrace. She uncurls her toes which releases Catherine from their warm embrace. Kyria spots the tiny girl amongst her large toes and plucks her from them.

Kyria lifts Catherine up to her face and grins. "And how did you get into the palace little one?" Kyria booms while laughing as Catherine looks at the huge pretty face of the giantess in terror.
123222.title: Kyria

1232222.content:
Catherine was terrified as she stared up at the pretty face of the huge giantess. She was suddenly shaken by the giantess. "I asked you a question mortal?" Kyria said her eyes narrowing.

"I-I-I don't know!" Catherine squeaked.

"You don't know? I think you're lying to me and I don't like being lied too."

"Puh-please believe me! I'm not lying!"

"I really don't care if you're telling the truth or not tiny. You're lucky I just finished eating or I would just eat you as well." Kyria boomed licking her lips and grinning like a predator.

"Please don't do that!" Catherine screamed thinking of how this giantess had just eaten numerous people.

"Well, one more of you little mortals can't hurt." Kyria said lifting Catherine to her mouth.

Catherine screamed as she was moved towards the warm mouth of Kyria. She could see the perfect white teeth and cried out.

"Wait, wait, wait! Don't eat me!"

"Why shouldn't I eat you hmmm?"

"You don't want to eat me. That wouldn't be fun for you."

"How would you know mortal? Have you ever eaten a human before? It can be quite amusing." Kyria said with a smirk.

"N-No. I have not." Catherine replied sheepishly.

"If you don't want me to eat you, then what shall I do with you mortal? If you offer me an alternative and I like it, I may consider sparing you from my stomach... for now."

Catherine had to think quickly as she dangled from the giantess's fingers. She knew her time was running out. Catherine watched as the giantess rolled her eyes.

"I'm getting bored. I think you're just stalling for time. Accept your fate like your fellow mortals."

"Just hold on! I have something you'll like!"

Catherine had to work quickly. It was now or never. She thought back to Solas and Puella. This gave her an idea to appease this bronzed athletic goddess.

"How about we play a game?" Catherine said.

"A game? What kind of game?" Kyria said. She appeared interested though which was a good sign.

"Any kind of game? You're the goddess, why don't you choose?"

Kyria grinned at this. "You know your place mortal. Good, I like that. I have a few games I like to play with tiny humans."

Kyria was an athletic goddess and very bold. She was quite competitive and loved to play games with her fellow gods and goddesses and even with tiny mortals. Although most of the games involving tiny mortals ended with them being crushed under her feet or eaten by her. Kyria knew just the game to play with the tiny girl.

Catherine swallowed as Kyria picked the game she wished to play.
1232222.title: Kyria torments her

choices: Kyria decides to play another game...
Kyria is bored of her toy now...
Solas and Puella enter the room...
12322222.content:
A devious grin cracks the goddess' fierce expressions. "Very well, mortal. I have a game for you..."

She lowers Catherine away from her face, thankfully for the princess being far away from the cavernous mouth and enormous white teeth. Still, once she gets set on the floor in front of Kyria's foot, she felt the need to reconsider her offer, now realizing the folly of her supposed means of escape.

Kyria towers over her like the marble statues devoted to her in Catherine's kingdom - but far beyond any human scale. "We will play 'Dodge the Foot.' Simple game, yes?"

Catherine looks up puzzled. "How do I play it?"

Kyria's laugh is like thunder, shaking the princess without her realizing that the foot in front of her was gone. The shadow falls over her as she sees Kyria's big toe descending where she stands.

In a panic she dashes aside just before she could get smashed by the toe.

"Now you have the hang of it, little mortal!" She raises her foot again. "Look out, bug, here it comes!"

This time the ball of Kyria's foot meets the floor. Catherine lifts her dress in the vain hopes she can run faster than her captor can try and crush her. Another footfall blocks her path, knocking a gust up from the floor that pushes the princess aside like a dust grain. A couple more stomps give her the same option as she gets pushed away from certain death.

Until Kyria changes the game. Catherine's path gets blocked by her other foot and suddenly, sends her flying as she sweeps her with her sole. Catherine slides to the floor on her back, helpless as the other foot lowers over her. Kyria laughs as she pins the tiny princess between her big toe and her second. Catherine's view is obscured by the fleshy ravine, but beyond that; the giant goddess laughs down at her.

"Looks like you lost, mortal." Her toes curl around the princess. "I wonder if I should smash you between my toes like the little bug you are..." Catherine's eyes fill with tears now. Never has she been this afraid of someone or something...
12322222.title: Dodge The Foot

choices: Kyria, Puella and Solas decide to torment Catherine together
Solas and Puella wish to have Catherine returned to them, Kyria does not want to
123222223.content:
Tears began to flow down Catherine's face as she felt the pressure slowly increasing. The goddess was beginning to squeeze her toes tighter, slowly but surely and increasing the pressure on the tiny princess between them.

Catherine tried to cry out for mercy but couldn't even speak as she was slowly squeezed. This was it, this is how her life was going to end. She was a princess, and now she had reduced to nothing and was to be squashed like an ant between the toes of a mighty, merciless goddess.

"I wonder how much pressure you can take before you pop between my toes." Kyria boomed, gleefully.

As the toes of the goddess slowly closed in on her, Catherine could feel the ground beginning to shake. The goddess though continued slowly squeezing the tiny princess. The shaking would be unfelt by the towering goddess but to a tiny, the giant shaking could be felt on the floor.

The toes of the goddess were overwhelming, dwarfing the tiny princess between them.

The shaking of the ground continued, and Catherine despite her pitiful struggles between the tightening toes realized that shaking was becoming more and more pronounced. Catherine then heard voices.

"I cannot believe you allowed her to escape." A loud, annoyed sounding feminine voice boomed.

"I? If I remember correctly we were playing together Puella. She has not escaped, she's just good. How long has it since we had a mortal who has given us such an entertaining game of hide and stomp?" A deep, manly voiced replied.

The voices sounded as if they were in the hall outside the room but still Catherine recognized those voices. They belonged to the giant and giantess who had destroyed her tower, killed and captured her guards and kidnapped her.

The ground shaking increased before suddenly stopping and Catherine heard Puella's voice once more.

"Kyria! Greetings! How are you? I did not realize anyone had returned to the palace yet."

Kyria chuckled. "I returned only for a brief rest and to enjoy a meal. Rampaging through towns and torturing mortals builds quite an appetite."

Catherine heard the loud, thunderous laughter of both Puella and Solas as the ground rumbled once more.

Solas chuckled before continuing. "A trust your meal was rather enjoyable?"

"It was delightful." Kyria replied. "Had some of our finest meat sprinkled with mortals and washed it all down with some fine wine."

"Sounds delicious. I could go for some fine meat and mortals." Solas replied.

Puella giggled before Kyria spoke. Catherine meanwhile remained trapped between the tan toes of the goddess, slowly being squeezed between them.

"What are you two doing back in the palace so soon? I thought for sure you would be out terrorizing the mortals."

Puella and Solas both laughed.

"We had actually captured a rather unique mortal. One who we hoped would provide us with quite a bit of entertainment." Solas replied.

"Yes, we were playing a game of hide and stomp but Solas here has allowed our little plaything to escape." Puella said.

"I did not allow the mortal to escape!"

Kyria laughed. "Hide and stomp, one if my favorite games. So a mere mortal has managed to elude the mighty Solas in a game of hide and stomp?" Kyria teased as Puella giggled.

Solas offered no response to the giggling goddesses. After a brief pause he instead opted to change the subject.

"And what are you doing now Kyria? I see you have finished your meal. Will you be returning to the mortal lands to continue your rampage?" Solas said.

"A fine idea. I will eventually but first I need to first up my game own game."

Catherine was given a sharp squeeze by the goddess's mighty toes as she spoke.

"And what game is that?"

"Dodge the foot." Kyria replied.

Puella laughed. "I love dodge the foot! Such a fun game! We should have played dodge the foot, Solas."

Catherine continued to weep between the toes of Kyria. The squeezing had at least stopped and now she was just uncomfortably smushed.

"While I was enjoying my meal, a tiny mortal was running about at my feet. I plucked her up and was going to eat her as well but she convinced me otherwise."

"You found a mortal? And why did you spare said mortal from a voyage to your stomach?" Solas said. Puella giggled once more.

Kyria chucked. "She offered to play a game with me. You know how I love to play games with the tiny mortals, Solas."

"And this tiny, can I see her?" Solas said.

Catherine was suddenly painfully squeezed between Kyria's toes. She felt immense pressure as the goddess squeezed her.

"It is your lucky day," Kyria laughed, "for I have not yet crushed her under my foot, but why do you want to see the mortal?"

"Curiosity. Where is the tiny?"

"Between my toes. I've been debating on whether or not to play another game with her or simply crush her."

Puella laughed. Catherine felt the pressure subside and the toes of the goddess retreated. Catherine gasped for breath and thanked the gods she had been spared at least for now.

She gazed up and saw the smiling faces of Kyria and Puella high above her while Solas's looked to be in thought.

Solas bent down, lowering his face towards Catherine who lay sprawled on the floor, still trying to recover from being nearly mashed between a giantess's toes. His face was massive as it grew bigger and bigger as he looked closer.

"Solas, why the sudden interest in an ant I had between my toes?" Kyria boomed.

Solas's face suddenly retreated and he stood up to his full height once, towering above Catherine.

"Just as I suspected. This tiny is our missing mort. No wonder we could not find her, for Kyria here had her prisoner." Solas boomed.

Puella laughed loudly before she too peered down at Catherine.

"It is! It's our tiny princess!" She laughed.
123222223.title: Solas and Puella enter the room...

12323.content:
Catherine scampers through the massive halls before turning the corner into an elegant-looking room. The tiles themselves are like crystal and the walls almost golden. They are adorned with columns with silk curtains between them. On one side one such curtain stretched between columns leads to a balcony of sorts, but shocking to the tiny princess, the outside is almost a featureless cloudy white.

A gentle breeze causes the curtains to dance. Catherine can find some giant-sized benches, chests, and other random personal items to elude Solas and Puella, but she finds something larger and more interesting. A large canopy bed stands in the very middle of the room. Hopefully she can have enough cover behind the canopy curtain and the bed's shadow. She dashes over a tangled almost woolly carpet and dives beneath the curtain.

After passing the canopy curtain, she spots two tiny humans like her. They cower beneath one of the legs of the bed like a towering tree ready to fall. Why are they here? Are they being chased or tortured like her?

She shouted to get their attention. In unison, both of them gestured "hush" enough to be audible between them and Catherine. One covered his mouth while the other points up to the top of the bed with a pale blood-less sweaty face. A low groaning echoes from the top of the bed. Frightened of being caught by the giant gods she hoped to escape, she couldn't help but back away towards the inside of the curtain to see the half-sleeping body of another giant...
12323.title: Bedroom

13.content:
Damian starts his night uneasy. Each day he sits on his chair like a dragon over gold, leering at everyone he fears would take it from him. His cronies can be trusted as they put his enemies in place, but only so far. What if one of them robs and murders him one night? As he goes into bed, he listens to the wind blowing through the trees, hoping a creak in the floor would betray a thief. He lights his only candle by his bed stand and curls into a reluctant sleep. If he can stop the world from taking everything from him, he would.

The next morning, he wakes with a chill. He feels cold. His blankets are gone. His bed and bed stand are gone. Everything's gone. Damian curls into a ball frightened. Nothing exists besides a blinding light and strange heavenly haze. He hears a low wind before him and he forces himself out of his infant pose to look up. There before him sits a massive manly god, dressed in a silk cloth and sitting back on some throne obscured by the haze. "You're awake, finally..." he addresses with a thunderous voice.

"Who are you? What happened to my home?"

Damian's questions mean nothing as the god leans back and laughs like a thunderstorm. "YOUR wealth? You greedy insect, we have watched you this whole time. We have seen your wickedness towards the rich men of the village. We have seen your means to gather their gold - murder, extortion. We have seen the sins you've made on earth and we wish to punish you for them."

"We?" Damian turns his head and sees around him five gods, two giants and three giantesses. The one in front of him leans forward so his face is level with him. "As your punishment, you will be the slave for one of them." "What about you?" he asks. The god smiles. "I, Rex, have already taken what is yours to punish personally." Stretching his arms back he reveals a golden chain around his neck with little men dangling from the links. Damian knows the faint faces. They were his mob, his cronies suspended by their arms in front of the giant's pecs. "Take him..." Rex points to one of the five...
13.title: The Parliament of the Gods

choices: A giant hand reaches to grab her
A bold Susan hurls a projectile at the giant eye
14.content:
Susan expects another disappointment.
She had set up the runes in front of the altar in the hexagram pattern. She had lit the sacred incense, chanted, and waved her specially crafted staff in the air as she danced. It was all part of the ritual to summon the Gods but after so many attempts and a depressing zero number of successes, Susan was beginning to worry that her whole life had been a life studying a lie; the Gods were not real, her magic was just a fake dream.

Then something happens this time. Something that has never ever happened before. The runes glow brightly, a flame compared to the usual, barely visible hues. The entire temple rumbles slightly, followed by a series of larger quakes. The entire town is trembling as if a storm was ripping it from the foundation and flying it across the sky.
"Spare me! Please Gods, I believe and I will serve!" screams the priestess with a newfound faith. When the shaking of her entire world stops, and the entire temple is in shambles with blocks missing from the sound walls and the sacred arrangement spread out everywhere. A massive eye peeks through the only empty space of the often dark temple. The eyelid flutters and sends gusts of air into the room.
14.title: Dead to Rites

141.content: The giant eye moves away and a massive hand bursts though the wall. It teaches down and grabs Susan roughly while she screams. She is lifted up and sees it is a giant female she is staring at. The giantess grins. The giantess is
141.title: A giant hand reaches to grab her

1413.content:
"What a cutie you are" Venus is pleased by Susan shape "We'll have a alot of fun don't you worry." Venus tell Susan

Susan is taken away by the beautiful Venus. In an instant Susan is in the place of where Venus resides. Venus grows Susan leaving her naked. "Madam goddess please give me some clothes." "Why would I give you clothes when we are going to have fun" Venus goes after Susan and corners her. "Now don't be scared" Venus seductively whispers to Susan "I'm going to give you the time of your life but first I need a man. Venus opens a portal and reaches down for a guy she picks up...
1413.title: Venus

choices: They leave one of them for someone else to play with
15.content:
The couple snuggle close to one another throughout the night. Rachel reaches behind her to feel her lover's touch while Marcus sleeps with his face in her long brown hair. It was a peaceful night. The two dreaming of one another and their future together. But all that will change in the morning. Rachel is the first to wake, bewildered by the bright glow streaming through the windows as if the sun itself is standing outside to wake only them. Marcus shakes the sleepiness from his head as he crawls through the blankets. As his lover dons a nice tunic for the day and a jar for water, the ground quakes.

Marcus dives under the covers, followed by her lover reluctantly as she plans to leave with him for the day. Rubble rattles the floor and bits of plaster descend like chalk dust on the blankets. The two hold their hands and pray that all this would spare them. It becomes worse once the blankets get torn off the bed and exposing them to two massive figures. One is a handsome well-built giant and the other, a bronze-skinned goddess in a fur bra. "They look so cute," she says. The giant god reaches down and grabs Rachel's legs. She screams. Marcus refuses to leave her and while she gets lifted out of the bed, he dangles from her arms and kicking in midair. The goddess grabs his legs and tries to pull them apart.

"I guess they won't leave separately." the giant addresses. "And to think we were going to share them and play nice." The goddess pulls a little more in the hopes to break their grip as they decide which of them gets which of the happy couple...
15.title: Divided

choices: Kyria takes Marcus to her home.
153.content:
Marcus and Rachel cryed out as huge fingers pulled them apart. Marcus could only watch helplessly as Rachel was taken away from him by a gigantic uncaring god. "I love you Rachel! I love you!" he cried out, "and I swear on the honour of my family that I will not rest until you are safely returned to me!"

The almost nude god smirked down at him. "Dangerous words, mortal. You have condemned yourself and your family to suffer in Hades. You are presumptious and it is unwise to challenge any god, much less Solas of the perfect form. This mortal woman is mine and I will do with her as I please. Be grateful that I do not punish you for your insolence!"

Marcus could only look on in horror at Rachel trapped in the god's hand as he ignored him and spoke to the goddess who held him. "It worked out well, Kyria. Do I not look magnificent compared to these tiny mortals?"

The immense huntress smiled warmly and said "You look magnificant compared to any, mortal or god, Solas as well you know. Mayhap, one day when you have finished playing games with mortals you may show me favour?"

Solas laughed. "Mayhap. We may speak again after I have had my sport with this plaything." With that he simply turned away carrying Rachel with him like a tiny doll. Marcus screamed and yelled as his love was taken, crying, away.

Then the goddess was moving and taking him with her in another direction.

"Please stop, oh goddess! I implore you! I must not be kept from my sworn duty!"

Kyria looked down.
153.title: The Abduction of Rachel the Pure by the God, Solas

choices: Marcus refuses and trusts to his own gods.
Marcus becomes the champion of Kyria
Marcus becomes the champion of Kyria (with a different plan)
1531.content:
Marcus's protests were silenced by the closing of a strong hand and he found himself scrunched into a ball inside a huge fist, unable to move or speak. His world rocked in darkness as the goddess walked and then only a short time later the fist opened and he was dumped onto a broad tan plain.

He began to shout imediately. "I am devout! I pray and offer gifts at the temples, but though you be a goddess, the ally of the evil god Solas is my enemy and I will let nothing stand in the way of my mission to save my love... or die avenging her!"

A huge languid voice filed the air, "You are mortal, it's true but not all mortals are fools. I am the goddess Kyria and will be spoken to with awe. Do not be a fool or you will become aquainted with the anger of a goddess. But you are a mortal fool! Know this, little one, Solas the vain is an arrogant vessal with no content whose self aggrandising words and feeble mind bring disgrace to the houses of the gods. His disgusting use of mortal women... bothers me. His attire is that of a slave with a blind master. His words are vomit from the mouth of a diseased goat. His prowess in all things is far less significant even than you.

"While other gods may content themselves this day by playing frivolous games with mortals, Kyria plays the greater game! You, mortal may have a part to play in it and you may yet attain your wishes, both for reunion and vengence.

"Swear to reject your gods and follow me. Be my champion... Marcus Godslayer."

Marcus reeled at her words. He realised that the tan plain was the stomach of the goddess as she reclined in her vast home. He looked at her strong features. He must fulfill his oath, but to reject Midian and Forga?
1531.title: Marcus in the House of Kyria

info.brief_description: An entire town gets ripped from the earth by six giant gods and carried home for fun
info.description:
Humans

Derrick
Simple farmer trying to make ends meet

Catherine
Princess from a wealthy family, forced into marriage with an arrogant prince

Damian
Wealthy bandit who assumed nobility and extorted other nobles

Susan
Devoted priestess

Marcus and Rachel
A couple deeply in love and live together

Giant Gods

Rex
Lord of the gods, very beautiful and very powerful, wears a silken sash around his loins

Pugna
Very strong and muscular god, loves to fight, wears a tunic

Solas
Very handsome but also quite vain, seeing himself above everyone, wears a thong

Kyria
Very athletic goddess, very bold and manipulative, wears a fur loincloth and bra

Venus
Extremely beautiful goddess, very sexual and very thrill-seeking, wears a silken cloth around her body

Puella
Goddess who loves basking in praise, though views humans as playthings she still shows curiosity towards them, wears a silken bikini

Rules:
1. Keep sizes constant. The giants should be more than 200 feet tall.
2. All represented ages of humans and giants are between 20s-30s. No age changing.
3. Try to keep perspectives constant

I won't delete much so have fun!
